Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
butch \butch\ n. a lesbian who is noticeably masculine.
Syn: dyke. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
butch \butch\ (b[.u]ch), adj. 1. markedly masculine in appearance or manner; -- used of men.
Syn: macho. [WordNet 1.5]
2. same as {lesbian}. [pejorative] [WordNet 1.5]

butch adj 1: used of men; markedly masculine in appearance or manner [syn: {macho}] 2: pejorative synonym for lesbian n : offensive terms for a lesbian who is noticeably masculine [syn: {dike}, {dyke}]
